shrimp.name: SHW_brushedmtal
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: roughness
input.description: The apparent roughness of the surface.

shrimp.usage: Stephen Westin's anisotropic specular term, using Kajiya's Phong-like highlight from a cylinder (Siggraph 89) coupled with an arbitrary shadowing/masking function. This is meant to be combined in a network with ambient and diffuse terms. Note that Cs isn't taken into consideration here, nor is Os, these must be included in your network.
